infobox.Japanese title:: 世にも奇妙な天罰  (Yonimo Kimyō na Tenbatsu)
infobox.Cast:: Conan Edogawa  Wataru Takagi  Detective Boys  Juzo Megure
infobox.Character design:: Masatomo Sudo  Junko Yamanaka and Kumiko Shishido (design works)
infobox.Voice Cast::
Voice Cast:



Minami Takayama as Conan Edogawa  Chafurin as Juzo Megure  Wataru Takagi as Wataru Takagi, Genta Kojima, Next Conan's Hint  Yukiko Iwai as Ayumi Yoshida  Ikue Otani as Mitsuhiko Tsuburaya  Taro Arakawa as Rokusuke Urasawa  Masaaki Tsukada as Shinto priest  Hiroshi Yanaka as Takeo Takenaka  Kazue Ikura as Yuki Togawa  Kouki Miyata as Officer Otani

sections.Situation: A robbery of the temple and Takenaka's concussive injury is reported when the earthquake struck West of Tokyo. Can Takagi deduce how one man wanted to perform two crimes in one night?
sections.People:
- Victim (beaten - injured)
- 33 years old
- Office worker
- 25 years old
- Takeo's fiancée
- Tokyo MPD police officer
- 35 years old
- Teitan Shrine robbery suspect
- Teitan Shrine head priest
sections.Trivia:
- The title of this episode pays homage to the fantasy TV drama starred by Yuji Oda, named Tales of the Unusual (世にも奇妙な物語).
- Even though this is an anime-original case, the manga case The Shinkansen Transport Case broadcast four months ago was mentioned by the Detective Boys.
